isis.stitle: TSI 96-12-06 - Revision to the Specifications of the CMP Sensor clearance when the crankshaft is rotated in a clockwise and counterclockwise direction.

subjectgroup.subject: Revision to the Specifications of the CMP Sensor clearance when the crankshaft is rotated in a clockwise and counterclockwise direction.

geninfo.para: This TSI applies to all models with DT 466E and 530E engines.
Description:A correction needs to be made to the specifications for the CMP Sensor clearance when the crankshaft is rotated in a clockwise and counterclockwise direction.

para.emph: DT 466E and International® 530E Service Manual, EGES 160.

geninfo.para: A correction needs to be made to Section 11, page 2, Specifications for the CMP Sensor clearance as follows:
Crankshaft rotated in a clockwise direction . . . . . . 45 ± 0.304 mm (1.77 ± 0.012 in.)
Crankshaft rotated in a counterclockwise direction . . . . . . 29.6 ± 0.304 mm (1.168 ± 0.014 in.)
Crankshaft rotated in a clockwise direction . . . . . . 29.90 ± 0.356 mm (1.177 ± 0.014 in.)
Crankshaft rotated in a counterclockwise direction . . . . . . 29.67 ± 0.356 mm 91.168 ± 0.014 in.)

note.para: Keep a copy of this letter with the Service manual, Form Number EGES 160, until it is updated.
